title: Maou Evelogia ni Mi wo Sasage yo
synopsis: Ever since he laid hands on his favorite game, Toshiaki Gozu has admired its loathsome main villain: the demon king Evelogia, detested by all yet a character accompanied by loneliness his entire life.
